3285CV_BOOST_IMPL
3286CvClassifier* cvCreateBtClassifier( CvMat* trainData,
3287 int flags,
3288 CvMat* trainClasses,
3289 CvMat* typeMask,
3290 CvMat* missedMeasurementsMask,
3291 CvMat* compIdx,
3292 CvMat* sampleIdx,
3293 CvMat* weights,
3294 CvClassifierTrainParams* trainParams )
3295{
3296 CvBtClassifier* ptr = 0;
3297
3298 CV_FUNCNAME( "cvCreateBtClassifier" );
3299
3300 __BEGIN__;
3301 CvBoostType type;
3302 int num_classes;
3303 int num_iter;
3304 int i;
3305 CvCARTClassifier** trees;
3306 size_t data_size;
3307
3308 CV_ASSERT( trainData != NULL );
3309 CV_ASSERT( trainClasses != NULL );
3310 CV_ASSERT( typeMask == NULL );
3311 CV_ASSERT( missedMeasurementsMask == NULL );
3312 CV_ASSERT( compIdx == NULL );
3313 CV_ASSERT( weights == NULL );
3314 CV_ASSERT( trainParams != NULL );
3315
3316 type = ((CvBtClassifierTrainParams*) trainParams)->type;
3317
3318 if( type >= CV_DABCLASS && type <= CV_GABCLASS && sampleIdx )
3319 {
3320 CV_ERROR( CV_StsBadArg, "Sample indices are not supported for this type" );
3321 }
3322
3323 if( type == CV_LKCLASS )
3324 {
3325 double min_val;
3326 double max_val;
3327
3328 cvMinMaxLoc( trainClasses, &min_val, &max_val );
3329 num_classes = (int) (max_val + 1.0);
3330
3331 CV_ASSERT( num_classes >= 2 );
3332 }
3333 else
3334 {
3335 num_classes = 1;
3336 }
3337 num_iter = ((CvBtClassifierTrainParams*) trainParams)->numiter;
3338
3339 CV_ASSERT( num_iter > 0 );
3340
3341 ptr = icvAllocBtClassifier( type, CV_TUNABLE | flags, num_classes, num_iter );
3342 ptr->numfeatures = (CV_IS_ROW_SAMPLE( flags )) ? trainData->cols : trainData->rows;
3343
3344 i = 0;
3345
3346 printf( "Iteration %d\n", 1 );
3347
3348 data_size = sizeof( *trees ) * ptr->numclasses;
3349 CV_CALL( trees = (CvCARTClassifier**) cvAlloc( data_size ) );
3350
3351 CV_CALL( ptr->trainer = cvBtStart( trees, trainData, flags, trainClasses, sampleIdx,
3352 ((CvBtClassifierTrainParams*) trainParams)->numsplits, type, num_classes,
3353 &(((CvBtClassifierTrainParams*) trainParams)->param[0]) ) );
3354
3355 CV_CALL( cvSeqPushMulti( ptr->seq, trees, ptr->numclasses ) );
3356 CV_CALL( cvFree( &trees ) );
3357 ptr->numiter++;
3358
3359 for( i = 1; i < num_iter; i++ )
3360 {
3361 ptr->tune( (CvClassifier*) ptr, NULL, CV_TUNABLE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL );
3362 }
3363 if( !CV_IS_TUNABLE( flags ) )
3364 {
3365 /* convert */
3366 ptr->tune( (CvClassifier*) ptr, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL );
3367 }
3368
3369 __END__;
3370
3371 return (CvClassifier*) ptr;
3372}

3374CV_BOOST_IMPL
3375CvClassifier* cvCreateBtClassifierFromFile( const char* filename )
3376{
3377 CvBtClassifier* ptr = 0;
3378
3379 CV_FUNCNAME( "cvCreateBtClassifierFromFile" );
3380
3381 __BEGIN__;
3382
3383 FILE* file;
3384 int i, j;
3385 int data_size;
3386 int num_classifiers;
3387 int num_features;
3388 int num_classes;
3389 int type;
3390 int values_read = -1;
3391
3392 CV_ASSERT( filename != NULL );
3393
3394 ptr = NULL;
3395 file = fopen( filename, "r" );
3396 if( !file )
3397 {
3398 CV_ERROR( CV_StsError, "Unable to open file" );
3399 }
3400
3401 values_read = fscanf( file, "%d %d %d %d", &type, &num_classes, &num_features, &num_classifiers );
3402 CV_Assert(values_read == 4);
3403
3404 CV_ASSERT( type >= (int) CV_DABCLASS && type <= (int) CV_MREG );
3405 CV_ASSERT( num_features > 0 );
3406 CV_ASSERT( num_classifiers > 0 );
3407
3408 if( (CvBoostType) type != CV_LKCLASS )
3409 {
3410 num_classes = 1;
3411 }
3412 ptr = icvAllocBtClassifier( (CvBoostType) type, 0, num_classes, num_classifiers );
3413 ptr->numfeatures = num_features;
3414
3415 for( i = 0; i < num_classes * num_classifiers; i++ )
3416 {
3417 int count;
3418 CvCARTClassifier* tree;
3419
3420 values_read = fscanf( file, "%d", &count );
3421 CV_Assert(values_read == 1);
3422
3423 data_size = sizeof( *tree )
3424 + count * ( sizeof( *(tree->compidx) ) + sizeof( *(tree->threshold) ) +
3425 sizeof( *(tree->right) ) + sizeof( *(tree->left) ) )
3426 + (count + 1) * ( sizeof( *(tree->val) ) );
3427 CV_CALL( tree = (CvCARTClassifier*) cvAlloc( data_size ) );
3428 memset( tree, 0, data_size );
3429 tree->eval = cvEvalCARTClassifier;
3430 tree->tune = NULL;
3431 tree->save = NULL;
3432 tree->release = cvReleaseCARTClassifier;
3433 tree->compidx = (int*) ( tree + 1 );
3434 tree->threshold = (float*) ( tree->compidx + count );
3435 tree->left = (int*) ( tree->threshold + count );
3436 tree->right = (int*) ( tree->left + count );
3437 tree->val = (float*) ( tree->right + count );
3438
3439 tree->count = count;
3440 for( j = 0; j < tree->count; j++ )
3441 {
3442 values_read = fscanf( file, "%d %g %d %d", &(tree->compidx[j]),
3443 &(tree->threshold[j]),
3444 &(tree->left[j]),
3445 &(tree->right[j]) );
3446 CV_Assert(values_read == 4);
3447 }
3448 for( j = 0; j <= tree->count; j++ )
3449 {
3450 values_read = fscanf( file, "%g", &(tree->val[j]) );
3451 CV_Assert(values_read == 1);
3452 }
3453 ptr->trees[i] = tree;
3454 }
3455
3456 fclose( file );
3457
3458 __END__;
3459
3460 return (CvClassifier*) ptr;
3461}

3463/****************************************************************************************\
3464* Utility functions *
3465\****************************************************************************************/
3466
3467CV_BOOST_IMPL
3468CvMat* cvTrimWeights( CvMat* weights, CvMat* idx, float factor )
3469{
3470 CvMat* ptr = 0;
3471
3472 CV_FUNCNAME( "cvTrimWeights" );
3473 __BEGIN__;
3474 int i, index, num;
3475 float sum_weights;
3476 uchar* wdata;
3477 size_t wstep;
3478 int wnum;
3479 float threshold;
3480 int count;
3481 float* sorted_weights;
3482
3483 CV_ASSERT( CV_MAT_TYPE( weights->type ) == CV_32FC1 );
3484
3485 ptr = idx;
3486 sorted_weights = NULL;
3487
3488 if( factor > 0.0F && factor < 1.0F )
3489 {
3490 size_t data_size;
3491
3492 CV_MAT2VEC( *weights, wdata, wstep, wnum );
3493 num = ( idx == NULL ) ? wnum : MAX( idx->rows, idx->cols );
3494
3495 data_size = num * sizeof( *sorted_weights );
3496 sorted_weights = (float*) cvAlloc( data_size );
3497 memset( sorted_weights, 0, data_size );
3498
3499 sum_weights = 0.0F;
3500 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ )
3501 {
3502 index = icvGetIdxAt( idx, i );
3503 sorted_weights[i] = *((float*) (wdata + index * wstep));
3504 sum_weights += sorted_weights[i];
3505 }
3506
3507 icvSort_32f( sorted_weights, num, 0 );
3508
3509 sum_weights *= (1.0F - factor);
3510
3511 i = -1;
3512 do { sum_weights -= sorted_weights[++i]; }
3513 while( sum_weights > 0.0F && i < (num - 1) );
3514
3515 threshold = sorted_weights[i];
3516
3517 while( i > 0 && sorted_weights[i-1] == threshold ) i--;
3518
3519 if( i > 0 || ( idx != NULL && CV_MAT_TYPE( idx->type ) != CV_32FC1 ) )
3520 {
3521 CV_CALL( ptr = cvCreateMat( 1, num - i, CV_32FC1 ) );
3522 count = 0;
3523 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ )
3524 {
3525 index = icvGetIdxAt( idx, i );
3526 if( *((float*) (wdata + index * wstep)) >= threshold )
3527 {
3528 CV_MAT_ELEM( *ptr, float, 0, count ) = (float) index;
3529 count++;
3530 }
3531 }
3532
3533 assert( count == ptr->cols );
3534 }
3535 cvFree( &sorted_weights );
3536 }
3537
3538 __END__;
3539
3540 return ptr;
3541}
3542
3543
3544CV_BOOST_IMPL
3545void cvReadTrainData( const char* filename, int flags,
3546 CvMat** trainData,
3547 CvMat** trainClasses )
3548{
3549
3550 CV_FUNCNAME( "cvReadTrainData" );
3551
3552 __BEGIN__;
3553
3554 FILE* file;
3555 int m, n;
3556 int i, j;
3557 float val;
3558 int values_read = -1;
3559
3560 if( filename == NULL )
3561 {
3562 CV_ERROR( CV_StsNullPtr, "filename must be specified" );
3563 }
3564 if( trainData == NULL )
3565 {
3566 CV_ERROR( CV_StsNullPtr, "trainData must be not NULL" );
3567 }
3568 if( trainClasses == NULL )
3569 {
3570 CV_ERROR( CV_StsNullPtr, "trainClasses must be not NULL" );
3571 }
3572
3573 *trainData = NULL;
3574 *trainClasses = NULL;
3575 file = fopen( filename, "r" );
3576 if( !file )
3577 {
3578 CV_ERROR( CV_StsError, "Unable to open file" );
3579 }
3580
3581 values_read = fscanf( file, "%d %d", &m, &n );
3582 CV_Assert(values_read == 2);
3583
3584 if( CV_IS_ROW_SAMPLE( flags ) )
3585 {
3586 CV_CALL( *trainData = cvCreateMat( m, n, CV_32FC1 ) );
3587 }
3588 else
3589 {
3590 CV_CALL( *trainData = cvCreateMat( n, m, CV_32FC1 ) );
3591 }
3592
3593 CV_CALL( *trainClasses = cvCreateMat( 1, m, CV_32FC1 ) );
3594
3595 for( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
3596 {
3597 for( j = 0; j < n; j++ )
3598 {
3599 values_read = fscanf( file, "%f", &val );
3600 CV_Assert(values_read == 1);
3601 if( CV_IS_ROW_SAMPLE( flags ) )
3602 {
3603 CV_MAT_ELEM( **trainData, float, i, j ) = val;
3604 }
3605 else
3606 {
3607 CV_MAT_ELEM( **trainData, float, j, i ) = val;
3608 }
3609 }
3610 values_read = fscanf( file, "%f", &val );
3611 CV_Assert(values_read == 2);
3612 CV_MAT_ELEM( **trainClasses, float, 0, i ) = val;
3613 }
3614
3615 fclose( file );
3616
3617 __END__;
3618
3619}
3620
3621CV_BOOST_IMPL
3622void cvWriteTrainData( const char* filename, int flags,
3623 CvMat* trainData, CvMat* trainClasses, CvMat* sampleIdx )
3624{
3625 CV_FUNCNAME( "cvWriteTrainData" );
3626
3627 __BEGIN__;
3628
3629 FILE* file;
3630 int m, n;
3631 int i, j;
3632 int clsrow;
3633 int count;
3634 int idx;
3635 CvScalar sc;
3636
3637 if( filename == NULL )
3638 {
3639 CV_ERROR( CV_StsNullPtr, "filename must be specified" );
3640 }
3641 if( trainData == NULL || CV_MAT_TYPE( trainData->type ) != CV_32FC1 )
3642 {
3643 CV_ERROR( CV_StsUnsupportedFormat, "Invalid trainData" );
3644 }
3645 if( CV_IS_ROW_SAMPLE( flags ) )
3646 {
3647 m = trainData->rows;
3648 n = trainData->cols;
3649 }
3650 else
3651 {
3652 n = trainData->rows;
3653 m = trainData->cols;
3654 }
3655 if( trainClasses == NULL || CV_MAT_TYPE( trainClasses->type ) != CV_32FC1 ||
3656 MIN( trainClasses->rows, trainClasses->cols ) != 1 )
3657 {
3658 CV_ERROR( CV_StsUnsupportedFormat, "Invalid trainClasses" );
3659 }
3660 clsrow = (trainClasses->rows == 1);
3661 if( m != ( (clsrow) ? trainClasses->cols : trainClasses->rows ) )
3662 {
3663 CV_ERROR( CV_StsUnmatchedSizes, "Incorrect trainData and trainClasses sizes" );
3664 }
3665
3666 if( sampleIdx != NULL )
3667 {
3668 count = (sampleIdx->rows == 1) ? sampleIdx->cols : sampleIdx->rows;
3669 }
3670 else
3671 {
3672 count = m;
3673 }
3674
3675
3676 file = fopen( filename, "w" );
3677 if( !file )
3678 {
3679 CV_ERROR( CV_StsError, "Unable to create file" );
3680 }
3681
3682 fprintf( file, "%d %d\n", count, n );
3683
3684 for( i = 0; i < count; i++ )
3685 {
3686 if( sampleIdx )
3687 {
3688 if( sampleIdx->rows == 1 )
3689 {
3690 sc = cvGet2D( sampleIdx, 0, i );
3691 }
3692 else
3693 {
3694 sc = cvGet2D( sampleIdx, i, 0 );
3695 }
3696 idx = (int) sc.val[0];
3697 }
3698 else
3699 {
3700 idx = i;
3701 }
3702 for( j = 0; j < n; j++ )
3703 {
3704 fprintf( file, "%g ", ( (CV_IS_ROW_SAMPLE( flags ))
3705 ? CV_MAT_ELEM( *trainData, float, idx, j )
3706 : CV_MAT_ELEM( *trainData, float, j, idx ) ) );
3707 }
3708 fprintf( file, "%g\n", ( (clsrow)
3709 ? CV_MAT_ELEM( *trainClasses, float, 0, idx )
3710 : CV_MAT_ELEM( *trainClasses, float, idx, 0 ) ) );
3711 }
3712
3713 fclose( file );
3714
3715 __END__;
3716}

3719#define ICV_RAND_SHUFFLE( suffix, type ) \
3720static void icvRandShuffle_##suffix( uchar* data, size_t step, int num ) \
3721{ \
3722 time_t seed; \
3723 type tmp; \
3724 int i; \
3725 float rn; \
3726 \
3727 time( &seed ); \
3728 CvRNG state = cvRNG((int)seed); \
3729 \
3730 for( i = 0; i < (num-1); i++ ) \
3731 { \
3732 rn = ((float) cvRandInt( &state )) / (1.0F + UINT_MAX); \
3733 CV_SWAP( *((type*)(data + i * step)), \
3734 *((type*)(data + ( i + (int)( rn * (num - i ) ) )* step)), \
3735 tmp ); \
3736 } \
3737}
3738
3739ICV_RAND_SHUFFLE( 8U, uchar )
3740
3741ICV_RAND_SHUFFLE( 16S, short )
3742
3743ICV_RAND_SHUFFLE( 32S, int )
3744
3745ICV_RAND_SHUFFLE( 32F, float )
3746
3747CV_BOOST_IMPL
3748void cvRandShuffleVec( CvMat* mat )
3749{
3750 CV_FUNCNAME( "cvRandShuffle" );
3751
3752 __BEGIN__;
3753
3754 uchar* data;
3755 size_t step;
3756 int num;
3757
3758 if( (mat == NULL) || !CV_IS_MAT( mat ) || MIN( mat->rows, mat->cols ) != 1 )
3759 {
3760 CV_ERROR( CV_StsUnsupportedFormat, "" );
3761 }
3762
3763 CV_MAT2VEC( *mat, data, step, num );
3764 switch( CV_MAT_TYPE( mat->type ) )
3765 {
3766 case CV_8UC1:
3767 icvRandShuffle_8U( data, step, num);
3768 break;
3769 case CV_16SC1:
3770 icvRandShuffle_16S( data, step, num);
3771 break;
3772 case CV_32SC1:
3773 icvRandShuffle_32S( data, step, num);
3774 break;
3775 case CV_32FC1:
3776 icvRandShuffle_32F( data, step, num);
3777 break;
3778 default:
3779 CV_ERROR( CV_StsUnsupportedFormat, "" );
3780 }
3781
3782 __END__;
3783}
